author: felixweber
title: Eastern Town Hall
description: The Cardano & Catalyst Communities in the eastern hemisphere need a entry place to get in touch with Project Catalyst
solution: The Eastern Town Hall offers a place to local communities, to meet and connect, we provide a fast and safe onboarding experience to them
experience: The Eastern Town Hall organize and host successful online events for Asian communities since Fund 5. We want to grow and improve our format
